author: stefan2
msg: On the authzperf branch: Add support for recursive access rights
checks to the path rule prefix tree.  This makes the lookup feature
complete and all old lookup code obsolete.
The idea is simply to decorate all tree nodes with the min and max
access rights defined on the respective sub-trees.
(TODO, DONE): Another item is done now.
(node_t): Add fields for min and max access rights.
(finalize_tree): New code to recursively calculate the min / max
access rights on all nodes.  Later features will
(create_user_authz): Call the new finalizer as the last step during
(lookup): Add RECURSIVE parameter.  Use the MIN_RIGHTS fields to
quickly answer requrests for recursive checks.
authz_get_any_access): Drop all this old lookup logic.
